issue.title: [C++] Move Parquet APIs to use Result instead of Status
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17400](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17400). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Notably, IPC and CSV have "open file" methods that return result, while opening a Parquet file requires passing in an out variable.
